ygData.subject: Re: Help finding Brown chitten protector
ygData.msgSnippet: By the time you are in the high teens, there is nothing in south ro worth your while (all green) with the exception of the occasional Sand Giant, the very rare
ygData.messageBody:
By the time you are in the high teens, there is nothing in south ro worth
your while (all green) with the exception of the occasional Sand Giant, the
very rare Terrorantula, or the merchants.

I've heard that the Terrorantula can eat a Sand Giant for breakfast, but
then I personally saw a single group of high-30's (I'd guess) take it
without too much difficulty. I have screen shots even. Anyway, they looted
it and started shouting complaints because it's a lvl 35 mob, and all it had
on it was a couple of spider silk, spider legs and like 5 gp or something?
It was quite a rip. Of course, I saw this at least 2 or 3 patches ago, so
the whole world of norrath could be completely freakin different now.

-Kzak

-----Original Message-----
The Terrorantula does spawn in S Ro. All I have to say is good luck. He's
big enough to sit on 2 sand dunes by himself. And if he doesn't get you, the

hordes of undead, madmen and orcs that usually mob you at this point might.
BUT......... If you're high enough level or in a high level group, you could

probably take them.
